entry.title: A bike
entry.content:
These days, when Twinkle see other children ride a bike, we can feel that he wants to ride it too, So we decided to buy a bike for him.  
   Today I seeking bike through Second-hand trading websit(xianyu),find a bike,the owner say her kid just don't wanna to ride after buy it half of a year. the bike looks good, and its price is half of the orignal price, so after a conversation I buy it, I think when Twinkle see it, he will love it.

entry.title: Learing english
entry.content: Yesterday night, Twinkle try to learn English about animals. He knows Tiger, Lion, Elephant, Zebra, and Hippo. The most interesting is that he can't find the duck just in the top line of the page. He seeks it for many times, but he can't find it until I told him the location, the punishment was been scratched an inth, this is what he fears most, hahaha.
